items.title: String hex color ‡¶ï‡ßá Flutter Color ‡¶è convert

sections.description:

Input ‡¶π‡¶ø‡¶∏‡ßá‡¶¨‡ßá ‡¶è‡¶ï‡¶ü‡¶ø hex color string ‡¶®‡ßá‡¶Ø‡¶º‡•§
Null ‡¶¨‡¶æ ‡¶ñ‡¶æ‡¶≤‡¶ø ‡¶π‡¶≤‡ßá fallback color return ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá‡•§
# remove ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá, alpha ‡¶Ø‡ßã‡¶ó ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá ‡¶Ø‡¶¶‡¶ø ‡¶®‡¶æ ‡¶•‡¶æ‡¶ï‡ßá‡•§
Hex string ‡¶ï‡ßá integer convert ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá Flutter Color object ‡¶¨‡¶æ‡¶®‡¶æ‡¶Ø‡¶º‡•§
‡¶Ø‡¶¶‡¶ø ‡¶ï‡ßã‡¶® error ‡¶ò‡¶ü‡ßá, fallback color return ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡ßá‡•§
sections.code:
Color parseColor(String? hexColor, Color fallback) {
  if (hexColor == null || hexColor.isEmpty) return fallback;
  try {
    String formatted = hexColor.replaceAll("#", "");
    if (formatted.length == 6) { formatted = "FF$formatted"; }
    return Color(int.parse(formatted, radix: 16));
  } catch (e) {
    return fallback;
  }
}

Step .aab: For .aab File ‚Äî :
Release mode: ‚úÖ Explicitly release, Play Store ready
Obfuscation: ‚úÖ Yes
Mapping folder: ‚úÖ Custom (build/Prothes/symbols) ‚Äì ‡¶≠‡¶æ‡¶≤‡ßã organized

proguard-rules.pro
sections.code:
# =====================
# Firebase
# =====================
-keepattributes Signature
-keepattributes *Annotation*
# Keep all Firebase classes (Core, Messaging, Analytics)
-keep class com.google.firebase.** { *; }
-dontwarn com.google.firebase.**
# Firebase Messaging / Notifications
-keep class com.google.android.gms.** { *; }
-dontwarn com.google.android.gms.**
# Firebase Core / Analytics
-keep class com.google.firebase.messaging.** { *; }
-keep class com.google.firebase.analytics.** { *; }
# =====================
# Google Maps / Play Services
# =====================
-keep class com.google.android.gms.maps.** { *; }
-keep class com.google.android.gms.location.** { *; }
-dontwarn com.google.android.gms.**
# =====================
# Gson (used by Firebase)
# =====================
-keep class com.google.gson.** { *; }
-dontwarn com.google.gson.**
# =====================
# Kotlin & Coroutines
# =====================
-keepclassmembers class kotlinx.coroutines.** { *; }
-dontwarn kotlinx.coroutines.**
# =====================
# UCrop
# =====================
-keep class com.yalantis.ucrop.** { *; }
-dontwarn com.yalantis.ucrop.**
# =====================
# Multidex Support
# =====================
-keep class androidx.multidex.** { *; }
-dontwarn androidx.multidex.**
# =====================
# Flutter / Generated Plugins
# =====================
-keep class io.flutter.embedding.android.** { *; }
-keep class io.flutter.plugin.** { *; }
-dontwarn io.flutter.plugin.**
# =====================
# Keep All Model Classes (Hive / JSON Models)
# =====================
-keep class com.paikaree.bd.model.** { *; }
# =====================
# Keep Serializable classes (simple version)
# =====================
-keepclassmembers class ** implements *Parcelable { public static final *** CREATOR; }
# =====================
# Optional: Keep All Flutter Generated Classes (like R)
# =====================
-keep class **.R$* { *; }
-dontwarn **.R$*
# Instead of *
-keep class com.paikaree.bd.** implements java.io.Serializable { *; }
-keep class com.paikaree.bd.** extends android.app.Application { *; }
-keep class com.paikaree.bd.** extends android.app.Activity { *; }
-keep class com.paikaree.bd.** extends android.app.Service { *; }
-keep class io.flutter.embedding.android.** { *; }
-keep class io.flutter.plugin.** { *; }
# =====================
# EGL / OpenGL / RenderThread (prevent GPU crashes)
# =====================
-keep class android.opengl.** { *; }
-keep class android.view.HardwareRenderer { *; }
-keep class android.graphics.HardwareRenderer$** { *; }
-keep class android.view.ThreadedRenderer { *; }
-keep class android.view.RenderNode { *; }
-dontwarn android.opengl.**
# ===================== Flutter Engine Internals =====================
-keep class io.flutter.view.** { *; }
-keep class io.flutter.app.** { *; }
-keep class io.flutter.util.** { *; }
-keep class io.flutter.embedding.engine.** { *; }
# ===================== WebView (future safe) =====================
-keepclassmembers class * extends android.webkit.WebViewClient { public void *(...); }
-keepclassmembers class * extends android.webkit.WebChromeClient { public void *(...); }

items.title: Copy Folder or File Source to Destination Internal Work

sections.code:
@echo off
REM Destination folder
SET DEST=C:\xampp\htdocs\uploaded_files\test_downloads
REM Source folder
SET SRCONE=%USERPROFILE%\Downloads
SET SRCTWO=%USERPROFILE%\Desktop
IF NOT EXIST "%DEST%" (mkdir "%DEST%")
REM Copy all files from the source folder to destination, keeping folder structure
robocopy "%SRCONE%" "%DEST%" *.* /S /R:0 /W:0
robocopy "%SRCTWO%" "%DEST%" *.png *.jpg /S /R:0 /W:0
echo.
echo ========================================
echo ‚úÖ Test complete!
echo Check here: %DEST%
echo ========================================
pause

items.title: Copy Folder or File Source to Destination Online Work

sections.description: For Online Server
sections.code:
@echo off
SET SRCONE=%USERPROFILE%\Downloads
SET SRCTWO=%USERPROFILE%\Desktop
SET FTP_USER=your_ftp_username
SET FTP_PASS=your_ftp_password
SET FTP_HOST=yourserver.com
SET FTP_DEST=/upload/
echo Uploading Downloads...
for %%f in ("%SRCONE%\*.*") do (echo Uploading %%~nxf & curl -T "%%f" -u %FTP_USER%:%FTP_PASS% ftp://%FTP_HOST%%FTP_DEST%)
echo Uploading Desktop Images...
for %%f in ("%SRCTWO%\*.png" "%SRCTWO%\*.jpg") do (echo Uploading %%~nxf & curl -T "%%f" -u %FTP_USER%:%FTP_PASS% ftp://%FTP_HOST%%FTP_DEST%)
echo.
echo ========================================
echo ‚úÖ Upload complete!
echo Check your server: ftp://%FTP_HOST%%FTP_DEST%
echo ========================================
pause

)

If you Same Time Firebase store Extra ‡¶°‡¶æ‡¶ü‡¶æ : So Follow : Firestore Database ‡¶§‡ßà‡¶∞‡¶ø ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ :

then Fields ‡¶¶‡¶æ‡¶ì:

name ‚Üí string ‚Üí "Prothes Barai"
phone ‚Üí string ‚Üí "01317818826"
email ‚Üí string ‚Üí "prothes19@gmail.com"

Now Code Here
sections.code:
UserCredential credential = await FirebaseAuth.instance.createUserWithEmailAndPassword(email: email, password: password);
/// >>> Step 2: Get user UID For Saved Extra Data Every Users
String uid = credential.user!.uid;
await FirebaseFirestore.instance.collection("users").doc(uid).set({"name": name, "phone": phnNumber, "email": email, "createdAt": FieldValue.serverTimestamp(),});

sections.description:
Firebase Extra Data Show Based On Specifiq User Id

‡¶∞‡ßá‡¶ú‡¶ø‡¶∏‡ßç‡¶ü‡ßç‡¶∞‡ßá‡¶∂‡¶® ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶∏‡¶Æ‡ßü users ‡¶ï‡¶æ‡¶≤‡ßá‡¶ï‡¶∂‡¶®‡ßá uid ‡¶¶‡¶ø‡ßü‡ßá ‡¶°‡¶ï‡ßÅ‡¶Æ‡ßá‡¶®‡ßç‡¶ü Create ‡¶è‡¶ñ‡¶® ‡¶≤‡¶ó‡¶á‡¶® ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶∞ ‡¶™‡¶∞ ‡¶∏‡ßá‡¶á ‡¶≤‡¶ó‡¶á‡¶®‡¶ï‡ßÉ‡¶§ ‡¶á‡¶â‡¶ú‡¶æ‡¶∞‡ßá‡¶∞ uid ‡¶¶‡¶ø‡ßü‡ßá Firestore ‡¶•‡ßá‡¶ï‡ßá ‡¶°‡ßá‡¶ü‡¶æ ‡¶®‡¶ø‡ßü‡ßá HomePage-‡¶è ‡¶∂‡ßã ‡¶ï‡¶∞‡¶æ‡¶§‡ßá ‡¶π‡¶¨‡ßá
sections.code:
final String uid = FirebaseAuth.instance.currentUser!.uid;

return Scaffold(
appBar: AppBar(title: Text("Home Page")),
body: FutureBuilder(
future: FirebaseFirestore.instance.collection("users").doc(uid).get(),
builder: (context, snapshot) {
if (snapshot.connectionState == ConnectionState.waiting) {
return const Center(child: CircularProgressIndicator());
}
if (snapshot.hasError) {
return const Center(child: Text("Something went wrong"));
}
if (!snapshot.hasData || !snapshot.data!.exists) {
return const Center(child: Text("User data not found"));
}

var userData = snapshot.data!.data() as Map;

return Center(
child: Column(
mainAxisAlignment: MainAxisAlignment.center,
children: [
Text("Welcome, ${userData['name'] ?? ''}", style: const TextStyle(fontSize: 25, fontWeight: FontWeight.bold)),
const SizedBox(height: 10),
Text("Email: ${userData['email'] ?? ''}", style: const TextStyle(fontSize: 18)),
const SizedBox(height: 10),
Text("Phone: ${userData['phone'] ?? ''}", style: const TextStyle(fontSize: 18)),
],
),
);
},
),
);
